synoptic.main
Class ListedProperties

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Dictionary<K,V>
      java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>

              synoptic.main.ListedProperties
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>
public class ListedProperties
extends java.util.Properties

Extends Java's Properties class with the ability to specify and recall a list of property values corresponding to a key. This is used by Synoptic to handle property files that encode Synoptic command line options, which e.g. use the -r option to specify multiple regular expressions.

Author:
ivan
See Also:

put

public java.lang.Object put(java.lang.Object key,

Hook that replicates behavior of super and also updates propertyVectors to maintain a list of property values per key

Specified by:
put in interface java.util.Map<java.lang.Object,java.lang.Object>
Overrides:

getCmdArgsLine

public java.lang.String[] getCmdArgsLine()
Constructs an array that can be interpreted by plume library as command line arguments to Synoptic. The property key becomes the command line option and the list of property values is broken out into specification of the same option that appears multiple times with different values.

Returns:
string array corresponding to the properties command line
